meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>one</kanji> <kanji>floor</kanji> is the <vocabulary>first floor</vocabulary> (or <vocabulary>floor one</vocabulary>). In Japan, that means the <vocabulary>ground floor</vocabulary>. Pretty simple.
readingMnemonic: The reading is on'yomi because it's a jukugo kanji. Be careful of the 一 though. It gets shortened and has a little っ in there.
